events.name: ColdChainAlertTriggered
events.description: Indicates a temperature breach in the cold chain.

events.name: ColdChainAlertAcknowledged
events.description: When the user acknowledges they understand the alert.

events.name: ColdChainMonitoringUpdated
events.description: Indicates new monitoring parameters have been set.

events.name: ColdChainMonitoringFailed
events.description: When the monitoring system fails to function as expected.

events.name: ColdChainAlertResolved
events.description: When an alert is resolved after taking action.

commands.name: TriggerAlert
commands.description: Indicates a temperature breach in the cold chain.

commands.name: AcknowledgeAlert
commands.description: When the user acknowledges they understand the alert.

commands.name: UpdateMonitoring
commands.description: Indicates new monitoring parameters have been set.

commands.name: FailMonitoring
commands.description: When the monitoring system fails to function as expected.

commands.name: ResolveAlert
commands.description: When an alert is resolved after taking action.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: To notify about temperature issues affecting inventory.

integrationPoints.name: DeliveryManagement
integrationPoints.description: To alert on delivery schedules impacted by cold chain issues.

integrationPoints.name: ReportingSystem
integrationPoints.description: To provide insights and reports based on monitoring data.

integrationPoints.name: UserNotifications
integrationPoints.description: To push relevant alerts to user devices.
